title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: Bug 18163: When using `Ctrl+M` (Add Import), nothing happens due to trailing whitespace within the selected text.
OB: When using `Ctrl+M` (Add Import), nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace within the selection.
SR: It often happens to me that I have selected text and when I use `Ctrl+M` (Add Import), nothing happens because of the trailing whitespace within the selection.
